snippet: Washington quarterback Robert Griffin III has a torn lateral collateral ligament, which will require several months of rehabilitation.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Washington Redskins quarterback Robert Griffin III will have surgery on torn ligament in his right knee; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Washington quarterback Robert Griffin III has a torn lateral collateral ligament, which will require several months of rehabilitation.

headline.print_headline: Griffin Set for Surgery on Injured Knee
headline.seo: Redskins’ Griffin Set for Surgery for Torn Knee Ligament
headline.main: Griffin Set for Surgery on Injured Knee
